name: Crippling Grasp
description: Sap an enemy's agility and wrack them with pain, dealing 1199 Magic Damage and an additional 2900 Magic Damage over 10 seconds, immobilizing them for 2 seconds, and reducing their movement speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
effectLines: Converts some of the damage over time into more up front damage, and immobilizes the enemy on impact.
coefDescription: Sap an enemy's agility and wrack them with pain, dealing $1 Magic Damage and an additional $2 Magic Damage over 10 seconds, immobilizing them for 2 seconds, and reducing their movement speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
